snippet: Gov. Phil Bryant has joined a lawsuit seeking to stop an Obama administration program granting temporary reprieves from deportation to some young illegal immigrants.
abstract: Mississippi Gov Phil Bryant joins a lawsuit by Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents against Homeland Security Secretary Janet Napolitano, seeking to stop an Obama administration program granting temporary reprieves from deportation to some young illegal immigrants.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Phil Bryant has joined a lawsuit seeking to stop an Obama administration program granting temporary reprieves from deportation to some young illegal immigrants.

headline.main: Mississippi: State Joins Suit Against Migrant Reprieves
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: State Joins Suit Against Migrant Reprieves
